entry.title: isc30/ryzen-gpu-passthrough-proxmox
entry.summary: Get the Ryzen processors with AMD Radeon 680M/780M integrated graphics or RDNA2/RDNA3 GPUs running with Proxmox, GPU passthrough and UEFI included.
